rules_text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}, {T}, Exile Feather of the Simurgh: Exile a white enchantment card, a blue instant card, a black battle card, a red sorcery card, and a green creature card from your graveyard. If you exiled five cards this way, cast any number of them without paying their mana costs.
